name: submitted
description: Initial state after datapackage submission from client.

name: bag valid
description: BDBag validity check has succeeded, other processing is pending.

name: bag error
description: BDBag validity check has failed, submission cannot be processed.

name: check valid
description: Content pre-checks have succeeded, other processing is pending.

name: check error
description: Content pre-checks have failed, submission cannot be processed.

name: content ready
description: Submission is loaded and ready for human review.

name: content error
description: Content loading has failed, submission cannot be processed.

name: rejected
description: Submission has been rejected by human reviewers and should not be included in subsequent releases.

name: release pending
description: Submission has been approved and should be included in subsequent releases until obsoleted.

name: obsoleted
description: Submission has been obsoleted by a more recently approved submission from the same DCC.
